description: Valid single adult passenger request returns correct total price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with valid offer ID
Include 1 adult passenger
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
expected_result: Response contains totalPrice field with numeric value > 0 matching the offer

description: Valid multiple passenger types (adult + child) returns correct total price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with valid offer ID
Include 2 adults and 1 child passenger
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
expected_result: Response contains totalPrice field with numeric value > 0 and includes passenger breakdown

description: Missing offer ID in request returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload without offer ID field
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message 'offerId is required'

description: Invalid offer ID format returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with offer ID as empty string
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message 'Invalid offerId format'

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with offer ID 'INVALID123'
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 404 Not Found with error message 'Offer not found'

description: Valid offer with expired timestamp returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with valid but expired offer ID
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 410 Gone with error message 'Offer expired'

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with valid offer ID
Omit passenger details
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message 'Passenger details required'

description: Zero passengers in request returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with valid offer ID
Include passengers array with 0 passengers
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message 'At least one passenger required'

description: Valid offer with special characters in offer ID returns price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with offer ID containing hyphens and numbers
Include 1 adult passenger
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: Response contains totalPrice field with numeric value > 0

Content-Type header set to application/json
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message 'Invalid JSON format'
